name: I.CANT.SEE.
description:
(I.CANT.SEE. is a game where you have to navigate a maze while avoiding danger that you can’t see in its fullest.)

the lights are out.

 

you are just another employee when a blackout happens, and with that everything your facility was experimenting on starts to leak out. slithering noises, metallic cries, and a presence watching over you will stalk you while you stumble on the remains of what was a peaceful day.

your only weapon against the dark is a small GPS that will only light your fingertips. the situation is dire, but if you take your surroundings into account, then maybe, MAYBE you will see the light of day again.

 

oh, and don’t worry about messing with the unimportant stuff.
